text: Brad Joseph Lyons (born 26 May 1997) is a Northern Irish professional footballer who plays for Blackburn Rovers, as a midfielder. ==Career== Lyons began his career with Coleraine. In September 2018 he moved on loan to English club Blackburn Rovers, with the deal to become permanent in January 2019. In January 2019 he signed a permanent 18-month contract, his first ever professional contract. He stated that he wanted to break into the Blackburn first-team. Later that month he moved on loan to St Mirren. He was sent off 28 minutes into his debut, in the Scottish Cup, on 19 January 2019.
